title: Overcooked: All You Can Eat is now available on Stadia w/ 20% discount, free trial, no crossplay [U]
content:
Following a brief delay, the hit party game Overcooked: All You Can Eat will officially arrive tomorrow on Google Stadia.

The post Overcooked: All You Can Eat is now available on Stadia w/ 20% discount, free trial, no crossplay [U] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The hit party game Overcooked: All You Can Eat is now available on Google Stadia, with a completely free trial available for new players too.
